entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revert main loc process when 17.0 pass is done #20650
    6.0.1xx
  • Hide `--download-to-cache` and `--from-cache` parameters for workload install and update #20642
  • When installing or updating workloads, better handle flaky network connectivity #20617
    6.0.1xx
  • Inconcistencies in the CLI when working with SDKs #20616
  • dotnet run on macOS UX -- x64 emulation #20584

Closed

  • System.Exception: Publish has encountered an error #10621
  • Protect strong name key changes in ApiCompat / package validation #20593

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable main loc build while release/6.0.1xx is running #20648
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add manifest description to get on loc train #20647
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix workload hidden options #20646
    Area-Workloads
  • Update onelocbuild.yml #20645
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use 1ES build pools #20644
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Blazor AOT Cache Busting #20630
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Reorder the EmbedProjectAssetsFile condtion to skip probing the file … #20624
    Area-NetSDK
  • [Razor] Fixes packing on multitargeting projects #20609
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Ensure the manifest is not generated when there are no assets or discovery patterns #20607
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Fix casing issue when matching projects to configurations #20603
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Fix duplicate entries in blazor.boot.json manifest extensions #20602
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Unskip tests #20600
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Do not specify a protocol if server does not require secrets #20577
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [port to release/6.0.1xx] Fix cross-os symbol generation (#20481) #20626
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Fix cross-os symbol generation #20481
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Revert "Ensure the server and client are valid when sending / receiving hot reload messages" #20579
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch, 6.0.1xx
  • Revert "Ensure the server and client are valid when sending / receiving hot reload messages (#18912)" (#20579) #20594
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #20555
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Only warn about references that are actually needed at runtime #20567
    Area-Compatibility
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet
